Description:
Detects Obfuscated Powershell via use MSHTA in Scripts

Author: Nikita Nazarov, oscd.community
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Invoke-Obfuscation Via Use MSHTA
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (command like '%set%' and command like '%&&%' and command like '%mshta%' and command like '%vbscript:createobject%' and command like '%.run%' and command like '%(window.close)%')
